tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
    delivery_status VARCHAR(50),
    sent_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    received_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_errors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_log_id INT REFERENCES email_logs(id),
    error_message TEXT,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE error_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    error_code INT,
    error_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE email_messages (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_email VARCHAR(255),
    recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
    subject VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id UUID REFERENCES email_messages(message_id),
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_info VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE email_errors (
    error_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id UUID REFERENCES email_logs(log_id),
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    error_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE email_recipients (
    recipient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
    recipient_name VARCHAR(255),
    opted_out BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE email_domains (
    domain_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    domain_name VARCHAR(255),
    domain_status VARCHAR(50)
)
